remarks: This lemma is used to prove that ` x ` built as in Lemma 2 of [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 91, is such that x > 1 - ε on B. Here ` X ` is used to represent ` x ` in the paper, and E is used to represent ε in the paper.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
